settings.heading: Product Details
settings.content:
Premium Prints & Frames

Choose from two premium print materials:

  • Fine Art Paper (250g): Smooth, matte, and detail-rich. perfect for modern, vibrant fine-art poster look.

  • Cotton Canvas (400g): Textured with deep color depth and a classic painting-like art feel.

We offer Swiss-made high-quality frames and magnetic wood hangers

  • High-Quality Wood: featuring finely crafted edges that provide a polished modern finish 
  • Shatterproof Acrylic Glass: Durable and highly transparent for vivid, true-to-color displays
  • UV-Resistant & Non-Acidic: UV ink + PE glass protect against fading and damage
  • Robust Backing: Multi-point support keeps the frame stable and secure.

We use a standard frame profile: 2 cm (0.8" inch ) x 2 cm (0.8" inch) (front face x depth from wall). Final framed print dimensions add an addition of 2cm to width and height of selected print size.

settings.heading: Returns & Exchanges
settings.content:
You can return items within 30 days of purchase: To qualify, the item must be unused, in its original condition, and in the original packaging. Proof of purchase, such as a receipt, is required for all returns. You are responsible for return shipping costs, which are non-refundable.

Partial Refunds: In some cases, partial refunds may be granted: If the item is returned damaged, incomplete, or not in its original condition for reasons not due to our error.if the item is returned more than 30 days after delivery.

Exchanges: We replace items only if they arrive defective or damaged. 

Need more help? View our full FAQ For any questions about returns or exchanges, feel free to contact us at info@kuriosis.com.

settings.title: Frames
settings.icon_text_1: Premium wood frames, from Swiss Company

settings.title: Materials
settings.icon_text_1: Deep colors using pigment Giclée printing

settings.heading: Curated with Passion
settings.heading_sub: At Kuriosis, we take pride in curating and producing fine art prints that showcase exceptional quality and craftsmanship—celebrating the thrill of discovering new art and the joy of collecting something truly unique.

settings.text: customers trust us worldwide
5-Star Reviews show our commitment to quality & service
of our customers would recommend us to others.
Satisfaction Guarantee for every purchase.

settings.headline: Quality over Quantity
settings.text: We pride ourselves on curating an exclusive selection of art prints that reflect originality and taste. Our team of experts handpicks each piece to ensure a diverse, inspiring collection that adds character and style to any space.
settings.excerpt: Unique pieces, carefully chosen for you...

settings.headline: High-Resolution Images
settings.text: Our prints are crafted from meticulously reworked, high-resolution files, ensuring even the finest details remain sharp and clear, even at large or extra-large sizes. Unlike third-party images, our in-house reworking guarantees that no print appears blurry or pixelated, delivering stunning quality in every piece.

settings.headline: Museum-Quality Materials
settings.text:
Our prints are produced on 250g fine art paper or 400g cotton canvas, both of museum-grade quality. 

The paper offers a rich, matte finish ideal for deep color tones, while the cotton canvas adds texture and a timeless gallery feel. 

Both materials are FSC-certified and environmentally friendly.
settings.excerpt: Choose from fine art paper or canvas...

settings.headline: Chromolithography Printing
settings.text: We use advanced chromolithography printing technology for unmatched detail and color accuracy. This method ensures every nuance of the artwork is captured and transferred flawlessly, resulting in sharp, vibrant prints that stand out. Ideal for complex designs and high-quality art reproductions.

settings.headline: Japanese Archival Inks
settings.text: We use premium Japanese archival inks that are UV-resistant and non-acidic, ensuring your prints remain vibrant for decades without fading. These pigment inks offer exceptional color accuracy and longevity, making them perfect for museum-quality art prints.
settings.excerpt: Our ink ensures long-lasting, vivid prints...

settings.headline: Sustainable Production
settings.text: We are committed to eco-friendly production using renewable energy and CO2-neutral practices. Our materials are certified and responsibly sourced, including FSC-certified wood and paper. We aim for minimal waste by recycling excess materials and using precision packaging to reduce our environmental footprint.

settings.headline: Swiss-Crafted Frames
settings.text:
We offer premium frames and magnetic wood hangers, both crafted by a renowned Swiss manufacturer known for precision and exceptional quality. 

Our frames come in four elegant colors with sturdy edges and shatterproof acrylic glass, ensuring your art is protected and displayed beautifully. The non-acidic materials and stable backing prevent warping for long-lasting presentation. 

For a minimalist touch, our magnetic wood hangers use embedded magnets to securely hold prints, offering a modern, seamless display that enhances any room.
settings.excerpt: Quality display options for every style...

settings.headline: Handcrafted in Berlin
settings.text:
All our prints are produced in-house at our Berlin studio, equipped with cutting-edge printing and production technology. Our experienced team, oversees every step, from printing to framing. 

This hands-on approach ensures we maintain full control over every detail, giving each print the attention it deserves and resulting in consistently high-quality, meticulously crafted pieces.
Materials & production

settings.icon_1_text: We use museum-quality fine art paper or cotton canvas paired with premium Japanese archival ink.
settings.icon_2_text: We print with advanced chromolithography technology for unmatched color vibrancy and detail.
settings.icon_3_text: We offer high-quality frames and magnetic wood hangers, crafted by a Swiss company.
settings.icon_4_text: We produce and handcraft in our Berlin studio. Original pieces, curated by us.

settings.title: 1. High-quality Wood Frames
settings.content: Our frames, available in various color options, feature finely crafted edges that provide a polished, high-quality finish, enhancing the beauty of your artwork.

settings.title: 2. Shatterproof Acrylic Glass
settings.content: Our shatterproof acrylic glass combines durability and high transparency, ensuring your artwork stays safe while maintaining vivid clarity and true color representation.

settings.title: 3. UV-Resistant and Non-Acidic
settings.content: Our prints use UV-resistant ink. In combination with non-acidic PE glass, these safety measures prevent fading or damage, preserving the color brilliance over time.

settings.title: 4. Robust Backing for Secure Hold
settings.content: The frames include a stable backing with multiple support points, keeping the frame secure and preventing it from bending or drooping.

settings.text: Curated with Passion
Why Kuriosis?

At Kuriosis, we take pride in offering carefully curated fine art prints that emphasize quality over quantity. Each piece is thoughtfully selected, with some discovered like hidden treasures at flea markets or in archives, bringing you unique and expressive artwork that can effortlessly elevate your space.
#SupportLivingArtists

We believe more people should discover and appreciate unique art. Through our #supportlivingartists initiative, we carefully select outstanding designers and offer them a platform, helping to support and foster their creative journey.
We turn Ink into Magic!

Very reliable company with quality products and great customer care. Posters are a little pricier compared to budget poster companies but worth every penny, the difference in quality still gives great value for money.
settings.author: Sophia K

settings.text: The whole process of ordering and receiving the poster was great. The choice of posters is enormous and it took us while to find the right one. We are very happy with our choice. The quality of the print is outstanding.
settings.author: Iris G.

settings.text:
Beautiful art! Got one piece at a market in Berlin, then decided to get two more from the same collection to put on a big white wall in my bedroom. Shipping to Canada was smooth and faster than I expected.
Amazing customer service!
settings.author: Dani C.

settings.text: My order was easily placed and quickly delivered, outside of Germany. The posters are of a fantastic quality. This was the second time I ordered from Kuriosis and both times were a very good experience
settings.author: Patricia A.

settings.text: Good quality and very good service. I got it in about a week despite living in Japan. Thank you!
settings.author: Claudio P.

settings.text:
This is my second time ordering from here and the service and quality are second to none. I have ordered posters from other companies and their quality is no where near as good as Kuriosis. Also the postage is very quick.
Won’t go anywhere else now!!
settings.author: Leyland
